mapper.select: select distinct assign_detail from daily_tasks where assign_type='파트' and assign_date = #{assignDate} and admin_seq in (select admin_seq from admins where branch_seq = #{branchSeq}) order by assign_detail desc

select importance, daily_task, assign_detail, name as assign_name, finisher_id, finisher_name from daily_tasks, users where assign_date=#{assignDate} and assign_type='개인' and daily_tasks.assign_detail = users.user_id and admin_seq in (select admin_seq from admins where branch_seq = #{branchSeq})
mapper.insert: insert into daily_tasks (daily_task_seq, daily_task, assign_date, importance, assign_type, assign_detail, manual_task_seq, admin_seq) values(daily_task_seq.nextval, #{dailyTask}, #{assignDate}, #{importance}, #{assignType}, #{assignDetail}, null, #{adminSeq})

insert into daily_tasks (daily_task_seq, daily_task, assign_date, importance, assign_type, assign_detail, manual_task_seq, admin_seq) values(daily_task_seq.nextval, #{dailyTask}, #{assignDate}, #{importance}, #{assignType}, #{assignDetail}, #{manualTaskSeq}, #{adminSeq})
mapper.select: select daily_task from daily_tasks where assign_date=#{assignDate} and admin_seq in (select admin_seq from admins where branch_seq = #{branchSeq})
select daily_task from daily_tasks where assign_date=#{assignDate} and daily_task=#{dailyTask} and admin_seq in (select admin_seq from admins where branch_seq = #{branchSeq})
select distinct branch_seq from daily_tasks d, admins a where d.admin_seq = a.admin_seq and d.admin_seq=#{adminSeq}
select distinct admin_seq from admins where approve_date is not null and revoke_date is null and admin_seq = #{adminSeq}
